title: what font is the olive logo?
content:
i really like this simple font. does anywone know what font it is, or something close to it?

[http://www.logodesignlove.com/images/handwritten/olive-logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193827/http:/www.logodesignlove.com/images/handwritten/olive-logo.gif)
author: effective98

comments.content:
I use to work for the agency that designed this logo.  
The logo type was hand drawn and traced out.

ok. thanks. that certainly sounds believable. i was hoping it would be a font that i could buy, but sounds like no chance.

does anyone know of a font similar to this style. itâ€™s just so beautiful and simple.
thanks guys. those two fonts did seem pretty good. the olive logo seems a bit more awesome though. that design firm did a great job.
